net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_getRollExpressionForSpell
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Returns the RollExpression(s) for a given spell. If a spell requires an attack, an attack and damage expression will be returned. Otherwise, just whatever RollExpression dictated by the spell. If a spell doesn't require any roll, an empty list will be returned.
arg (0) = BasicSpell
Returns RollExpression[]
